snippet.title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel II - Launch Date Announcement Trailer (PS4)
snippet.description:
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel II will launch on PlayStation®4 on June 4, 2019!

Official Website: http://www.trailsofcoldsteel.com/cs2/
Online store:  https://store.xseedgames.com

The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel II gives players the chance to continue an upgraded version of this brilliant JRPG adventure on the PS4™ system. This new console version contains updated features not found in previous console versions of the game including dual voiceovers options for either English or Japanese audio and additional recorded English dialog scenes. Other new features have been designed for returning players will include the popular turbo mode option previously released in the PC versions of the series and in the recent PS4™ system release of The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel.
